sourcesContent:
Current users

{{ user }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { usernames: string[] = ['Hugo']; constructor(private userService: UserService) {} ngOnInit() { console.log('usernames should be displayed here') this.userService.getUsernames().subscribe( usernames => this.usernames = usernames ); console.log(this.usernames); } }
